definition: A food made of flour, water, and yeast, mixed together and baked.
examples: She baked a loaf of bread this morning.

definition: A pale yellow edible fatty substance made by churning cream.
examples: He spread butter on his toast.

definition: A food made from the pressed curds of milk.
examples: I love cheese on my pizza.

definition: An oval object laid by a female bird, containing a developing embryo.
examples: She boiled two eggs for breakfast.

definition: A swamp grass cultivated as a source of food; the grains used as food.
examples: We had chicken and rice for lunch.

definition: A strip, ring, or tube of pasta or a similar dough.
examples: She cooked some noodles with vegetables.

definition: The flesh of a cow, bull, or ox, used as food.
examples: They ordered grilled beef for dinner.

definition: The flesh of a pig used as food.
examples: She doesn’t eat pork for religious reasons.

definition: A domestic fowl kept for its eggs or meat.
examples: We had roast chicken for dinner.

definition: An animal that lives in water, breathes through gills, and has fins.
examples: She bought fresh fish from the market.

definition: A small free-swimming crustacean with an elongated body.
examples: He ordered fried shrimp for lunch.

definition: A cold dish of various mixtures of raw or cooked vegetables.
examples: She made a fresh salad with tomatoes and lettuce.

definition: A liquid dish made by boiling meat, vegetables, etc.
examples: The soup was hot and delicious.

definition: Two pieces of bread with food between them.
examples: He packed a cheese sandwich for lunch.

definition: A flat round cake of minced beef, usually served in a bread roll.
examples: We had burgers and fries at the café.

definition: A dish of Italian origin consisting of a flat round base of dough baked with toppings.
examples: We ordered a pepperoni pizza for dinner.

definition: Italian food made from flour and water and shaped into different forms.
examples: She cooked spaghetti pasta for dinner.

definition: A thick liquid served with food to add flavor.
examples: She added tomato sauce to the pasta.

definition: A substance used to give flavor to food, like pepper or cinnamon.
examples: They used many spices in the curry.

definition: A white substance used to season or preserve food.
examples: Add a pinch of salt to the soup.

definition: A pungent spice obtained from peppercorns, used to season food.
examples: He sprinkled black pepper on the eggs.

definition: A round vegetable with many layers and a strong smell.
examples: She chopped the onions for the soup.

definition: A plant used as a spice with a strong smell and taste.
examples: Add some garlic to make it more flavorful.

definition: A soft red fruit used in salads and cooking.
examples: She sliced fresh tomatoes for the salad.

definition: A tapering orange-colored root eaten as a vegetable.
examples: He added carrots to the stew.

definition: A starchy plant tuber which is one of the world's main food crops.
examples: She made mashed potatoes for dinner.

definition: The sweet and fleshy product of a tree or plant that contains seeds.
examples: She eats a lot of fresh fruit every day.

definition: A round fruit with red, yellow, or green skin and firm white flesh.
examples: He ate an apple after lunch.

definition: A long curved fruit with a yellow skin and soft sweet flesh.
examples: She peeled a banana for breakfast.

definition: A small round fruit, typically green or purple, used to make wine.
examples: He ate a bunch of grapes for dessert.

definition: A round juicy citrus fruit with a tough bright reddish-yellow rind.
examples: She drank a glass of orange juice.

definition: A yellow citrus fruit with acidic juice.
examples: Add some lemon juice to the tea.

definition: A large fruit with green skin and sweet watery red flesh.
examples: They ate slices of watermelon on a hot day.

definition: A large tropical fruit with sweet yellow flesh and a tough skin.
examples: She added pineapple to the fruit salad.

definition: A juicy tropical fruit with yellowish-red skin and a large seed inside.
examples: Ripe mangoes are sweet and fragrant.

definition: A sweet soft red fruit with seeds on its surface.
examples: She topped her cake with strawberries.

definition: A sweet fruit with a round base and tapering top.
examples: He bit into a juicy pear.

definition: A small, round fruit with red or black skin and a stone inside.
examples: She put a cherry on top of the ice cream.

definition: A round fruit with soft red-yellow skin and juicy flesh.
examples: The peaches are ripe and sweet this season.

definition: A large brown seed of a tropical palm, containing edible white flesh and liquid.
examples: Coconut milk is used in many Asian dishes.

definition: A large round fruit with sweet pulpy flesh and many seeds.
examples: He cut the melon into slices.

definition: A large round yellow citrus fruit with a bitter taste.
examples: She ate half a grapefruit for breakfast.

definition: A small round fruit without a stone, such as a strawberry or blueberry.
examples: Berries are rich in vitamins.

definition: A white liquid produced by female mammals to feed their young.
examples: He drinks a glass of milk every morning.

definition: A hot drink made by infusing the dried leaves of the tea plant in boiling water.
examples: She prefers green tea in the morning.

definition: A drink made from roasted and ground coffee beans.
examples: He ordered a cup of black coffee.

definition: The liquid that comes from fruit or vegetables.
examples: She poured orange juice into a glass.

definition: A clear, colorless liquid that forms the seas, lakes, and rain.
examples: Drink plenty of water every day.

definition: Frozen water, a brittle transparent crystalline solid.
examples: She put ice cubes in the drink.

definition: A sweet baked food made from flour, sugar, and other ingredients.
examples: She baked a chocolate cake for his birthday.

definition: A small sweet baked food made from flour, sugar, and butter.
examples: He ate a chocolate chip cookie.

definition: A sweet brown food made from roasted cocoa beans.
examples: She loves dark chocolate.

definition: A soft frozen food made with sweetened milk and cream.
examples: We had vanilla ice cream for dessert.

definition: A sweet sticky yellow substance made by bees.
examples: She likes honey in her tea.

definition: A sweet spread made from fruit boiled with sugar.
examples: She spread strawberry jam on the toast.

definition: The first meal of the day.
examples: She eats eggs and toast for breakfast.

definition: A meal eaten in the middle of the day.
examples: They had sandwiches for lunch.

definition: The main meal of the day, eaten in the evening.
examples: We had chicken and rice for dinner.
